description.time_since_cap: How long back to spell out time since
description.format: Present date's in this format. Default: D d M Y
description.action: What to do with the inputted date: formatDate, timesince, timeuntil. Can be false to just output the timestamp.
description.labels: Array containing translations valid keys: year, month, week, day, hour, minute, second
description.labelsPlural: Array containing translations valid keys: year, month, week, day, hour, minute, second
description.timeSinceSuffix: Suffix for the time since label
description.nowLabel: What to show when the date is considered to be in the present
description.timeNowCap: How many seconds back to show 'nowLabel'
